title: Baked Ham with Brown Sugar Mustard Glaze
ingredients: 1 (12 pound) shankless skinless smoked cured ham
1 Cup firmly packed light brown sugar
instructions: Set oven to 350 degrees.	Score top of ham into diamonds and stud center of each diamond with a clove. Place ham on a rack in a roasting pan and bake for 1 1/2 hours. In a bowl combine the sugar, mustard and vinegar and spread glaze evenly over ham. Bake for another 35 minutes Transfer ham to a platter and let stand 15 minutes before carving.
